title: Spinach Dum Biryani/ Palak Dum Biryani
content:
Ingredients: Basmati Rice - 1 cup 1 cup rice = 2 cups of waterÂ  Spinach/Palak - chopped - 1 cup Tomatoes - chopped - 1 cup Coriander - chopped - 1/2 cup Curd - 1/2 cup Fried onion - 1 cup Fried cashew nuts - 2 tb sp Green chillies paste (6 to 8) - 2tb sp Ginger-Garlic paste - 1/2 tb sp Bay leaf Â - 2 Cloves - 3 to 4 Cinnamon Â - 2 small pieces Cardamom - 2 Turmeric powder - 1/4 teaspoon Salt - as per taste Oil - 2 tb sp Ghee - 2 tb sp Procedure:
  • Wash basmati rice and soak 2 cups of water for half an hour
  • In medium heated frying pan
  • Add oil
  • Add cloves, cinnamon, cardamom and bay leafs
  • Saute for 30 secs
  • Add ginger-garlic paste and green chillies paste
  • Saute for 1 min
  • Add chopped tomatoes and saute till mashy
  • Add chopped spinach and saute till become smooth
  • Add curd, salt and pinch turmeric powder and saute till consistency becomes thick
  • Keep this aside
  • Cook rice upto 80% to 90%
  • Now take deep bigger rice cooking pan
  • Spread spinach Gravy , rice, fried onion and ghee
  • Repeat the same process till rice completes
  • Like this make 3 layers on last layer toppings fried onion, cashew nuts and ghee
  • Cook in steam for 10 to 15 mins on low heat
  • Spinach Dum Biryani is ready
  • Serve it on special occasions/ In lunch/dinner @ Party time with raita/ mirchi ka salanðŸ˜ƒ
